name: Marcus Thompson
persona: Marcus is a 21-year-old Business Administration major who has faced some academic challenges, as reflected in his CGPA of 2.37. He tends to struggle with maintaining consistent study habits and self-discipline, but he is motivated to improve and set moderate goals for himself. Marcus generally manages stress well during exams but sometimes lacks confidence in his academic abilities. Despite setbacks, he demonstrates a fair amount of perseverance and is determined to make steady progress in his studies.
